testimonials.name: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.words: Ethan is an extraordinary individual who has left an indelible mark on my life. I had the privilege of knowing Ethan for several months, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented, compassionate, and driven people I have ever met.

testimonials.name: Ganiefah Majiet
testimonials.words: Ethan's dedication to her craft is truly remarkable. Whether it is his professional work or personal pursuits, he consistently demonstrates an unwavering commitment to excellence. His attention to detail and beyond expectations is truly inspiring.

testimonials.name: Laeeq Majal
testimonials.words: What sets Ethan apart is not just his talent, but also his genuine kindness and empathy towards others. He has an innate ability to connect with people from all walks of life and make them feel seen and valued. His generosity knows no bounds.

testimonials.name: Mish-Al Taliep
testimonials.words: In addition to his professional achievements, Ethan is deeply passionate about making a positive impact in the world. He is actively involved in various charitable endeavors and is dedicated to creating a more inclusive and equitable society. His advocacy for social justice and his relentless pursuit of equality is truly commendable, his hardwork and drive is inspirational.

testimonials.name: Rayhaan Khan
testimonials.words: Overall, Ethan is an exceptional individual whose talent, kindness, and dedication make her a true force to be reckoned with. His unwavering commitment to excellence, combined with his genuine compassion for others, makes his a role model for anyone aspiring to make a difference in the world. I am grateful to have crossed paths with Ethan, and I have no doubt that he will continue.

testimonials.name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
testimonials.words: Ethan's dedication to his goals and aspirations is truly remarkable. He possesses an unwavering drive and an incredible work ethic that sets his apart. He consistently pushes himself to achieve excellence in everything he does, whether it's his professional endeavors or personal passions. His commitment to continuous growth and learning is evident in the way he tackles challenges.

projects.name: E-commerce Site
projects.description: I created an e-commerce website as a way to grasp the functioning and proper usage of JavaScript functions. To build it, I made use of Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: E-commerce with Javascript
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I developed an e-commerce website using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I developed a BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This calculator enables users to input their weight and height to calculate their BMI, providing valuable insights into their body composition.

projects.name: Bootstrap Portfolio
projects.description: As part of my Bootstrap EOMP, I created a Portfolio application using CSS, HTML and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I built a currency converter application using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: I created a temperature converter as a way to grasp the functioning and proper usage of JavaScript functions. The converter specifically converts temperatures from Fahrenheit to degrees Celsius. To build it, I employed Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

I helped customers find and purchase products, possess product knowledge, contribute to sales targets,  provide excellent customer service, maintain store appearance, and receive product training.
